channel.title: Secret Pants Sketch Comedy (video)
channel.description:
Secret Pants is the longest-running consistently active sketch comedy group in Philadelphia.
As a live troupe, they perform monthly in and around Philadelphia; sometimes further away when making it to work on time isn’t a concern. As a marginally successful internet sketch group, they have produced nearly one-hundred online videos and have been featured on Comedy Central, College Humor, FuseTV, Digg, and other sites that steal videos and post them as their own.
Secret Pants was the winner of the first and second “Dirtiest Sketch in Philadelphia” competition and other things that didn’t award prize money.
Also, they’re negative.

image.title: Secret Pants Sketch Comedy (video)
image.description: Secret Pants is the longest-running consistently active sketch comedy group in Philadelphia.

channel.itunes:author: Secret Pants Sketch Comedy (video)
channel.itunes:subtitle: Secret Pants is the longest-running consistently active sketch comedy group in Philadelphia.

Secret Pants is the longest-running consistently active sketch comedy group in Philadelphia.
As a live troupe, they perform monthly in and around Philadelphia; sometimes further away when making it to work on time isn’t a concern. As a marginally successful internet sketch group, they have produced nearly one-hundred online videos and have been featured on Comedy Central, College Humor, FuseTV, Digg, and other sites that steal videos and post them as their own.
Secret Pants was the winner of the first and second “Dirtiest Sketch in Philadelphia” competition and other things that didn’t award prize money.
Also, they’re negative.
channel.itunes:keywords: secret, pants, sketch, comedy, secretpants.net, sketch comedy, secret pants, onion, english, business, philadelphia, bush, or, batman, mature, themes, improv

item.title: The Dark Ages Faire
item.description:
Why visit the Renaissance Faire when you re-live a time in history when life was really terrible-- the Dark Ages Faire! It's going to be off the mace and chain.

Written with the help and guidance of Pierce and Darin Hayton (http://dhayton.haverford.edu/ Twitter: @dhayton), one of the coolest science historians we know (we actually know a couple of them now) and voiced by Kevin Gunn, a treasure in the hidden city of Philadelphia.
item.itunes:author: Secret Pants Sketch Comedy http://www.secretpants.net
item.itunes:subtitle: Why visit the Renaissance Faire when you re-live a time in history when life was really terrible-- the Dark Ages Faire! It's going to be off the mace and chain.
